data.name: index_applydesc
data.value: Click this button to apply the current firewall configuration, using the firewall installed on your operating system.

data.name: index_bootupdesc
data.value: Change this option to control whether your firewall is activated at boot time or not.

data.name: rules_none
data.value: No firewall rules have been defined yet. All traffic will be allowed through untouched.

data.name: rule_anywheredest
data.value: Any host or network (except the firewall host)

data.name: rule_esource
data.value: Missing or invalid source hostname, IP address or network

data.name: rule_edest
data.value: Missing or invalid destination hostname, IP address or network

data.name: rule_ename
data.value: Invalid group name for host or network

data.name: rule_rusured
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this rule?

data.name: rule_rusures
data.value: Are you sure you want to modify this rule?

data.name: service_eport
data.value: Missing or invalid TCP or UDP port number, range (like 100-200) or list of ports in row $1

data.name: service_eicmp
data.value: Missing or invalid ICMP type number in row $1

data.name: service_eip
data.value: Missing or invalid IP protocol number in row $1

data.name: service_eclash
data.value: A service with the same name already exists

data.name: service_eprotos
data.value: All protocols must be the same

data.name: service_einuse
data.value: This service is being used by a rule

data.name: service_einuse2
data.value: This service is a member of another service

data.name: groups_add
data.value: Add a new host and network group.

data.name: groups_none
data.value: No host groups have been defined yet.

data.name: group_eclash
data.value: A group with the same name already exists

data.name: group_emember
data.value: '$1' is not a valid hostname, IP address or network

data.name: group_einuse
data.value: This group is in use by a rule

data.name: group_in_use_nat
data.value: This group is in use by a nat rule

data.name: group_in_use_group
data.value: This group is in use by the group

data.name: group_eself
data.value: A group cannot contain itself as a member

data.name: group_eneg
data.value: Negation cannot be used with the network range $1

data.name: nat_mapsdesc
data.value:
If an external interface is selected,
a virtual interface will be added
to it for the external IP address
when the firewall is activated.

data.name: nat_eext
data.value: The external name/group has more then 1 IP in row $1

data.name: nat_eint
data.value: The internal name/group has more then 1 IP in row $1

data.name: pat_ehost
data.value: Missing or invalid internal host in row $1

data.name: pat_eiface
data.value: Missing or invalid external interface in row $1

data.name: spoof_err
data.value: Failed to save address spoofing settings

data.name: spoof_enet
data.value: '$1' is not a valid network address - must be like 192.168.1.0/24

data.name: syn_spoof
data.value: Block TCP connections that do not start with <tt>syn</tt> packet?

data.name: syn_fin
data.value: Block TCP packets with both <tt>syn</tt> and <tt>fin</tt> set?

data.name: apply_done
data.value: .. done. Firewall rules are now active, and routing has been enabled.

data.name: apply_ecannot
data.value: You are not allowed to apply the firewall configuration

data.name: stop_done
data.value: .. done. All traffic will now be allowed, and but routing has been disabled.

data.name: backup_edest
data.value: Missing or invalid backup destination file

data.name: backup_edestdir
data.value: Directory for destination file does not exist

data.name: backup_ewhat2
data.value: None of the selected objects are in use on this firewall

data.name: backup_done1
data.value: A backup of the firewall configuration has been successfully saved to $1.

data.name: backup_done2
data.value: A backup of the firewall configuration has been successfully uploaded to the FTP server $1 as $2.

data.name: backup_done3
data.value: A backup of the firewall configuration has been successfully emailed to $1.

data.name: backup_donesched
data.value: The schedule backup settings have been saved.

data.name: backup_ezipcmd
data.value: The <tt>zip</tt> and <tt>unzip</tt> commands are needed for the backup and restore functions to work, but are not installed on your system.

data.name: restore_esrc
data.value: The source file on the server does not exist

data.name: restore_etar
data.value: The selected backup source file is not in a valid format

data.name: restore_cerr
data.value: The backup could not be restored, as the following consistency errors were detected in the restored configuration :

data.name: restore_enat
data.value: The group <tt>$1</tt> used for Network Address Translation does not exist.

data.name: restore_epat
data.value: The service <tt>$1</tt> used for Port Address Translation does not exist.

data.name: restore_eservice
data.value: The service <tt>$1</tt> used in rule $2 does not exist.

data.name: restore_etime
data.value: The time range <tt>$1</tt> used in rule $2 does not exist.

data.name: restore_egroup
data.value: The group <tt>$1</tt> used in rule $2 does not exist.

data.name: restore_done
data.value: The firewall configuration has been successfully restored from the chosen backup file.

data.name: restore_epass2
data.value: The backup is password protected, but no password was entered

data.name: ecannot
data.value: You are not allowed to use the <tt>$1</tt> page

data.name: users_desc
data.value: The users listed on this page have access to firewall module, with the selected privileges.

data.name: users_none
data.value: No users with access to only the firewall have been created yet.

data.name: bootup_ecannot
data.value: You are not allowed to enable or disable the firewall at boot time

data.name: times_none
data.value: No time ranges have been defined yet.

data.name: time_eclash
data.value: A time range with the same name already exists

data.name: time_efrom
data.value: Missing or invalid starting time - must be in HH:MM format

data.name: time_eto
data.value: Missing or invalid ending time - must be in HH:MM format

data.name: time_edays
data.value: No days of the week selected

data.name: time_einuse
data.value: This time range is being used by a firewall rule

data.name: remote_err
data.value: Failed to save remote logging settings

data.name: import_desc1
data.value:
This form can be used to add firewall rules from a file in CSV format. The file must have the following columns:
Source The source IP address, hostname or network, or blank for any
Destination The destination IP address, hostname or network, or blank for any
Services The names of services to match, or blank for any
Action The action to take for matching packets. If the action is followed by log, then the rule will be logged too.
Comment An optional comment for this rule
Time An optional time range name that the rule applies in

data.name: import_desc2
data.value:
This form can be used to add services from a file in CSV format. The file must have the following columns:
Name Name of the service
Protocol A protocol like TCP or UDP
Port A port number

data.name: import_desc3
data.value:
This form can be used to add host groups from a file in CSV format. The file must have the following columns:
Name Name of the group
Member A member IP address, network or host. Multiple member columns can be specified.

data.name: import_desc4
data.value:
This form can be used to add time ranges from a file in CSV format. The file must have the following columns:
Name Name of the range
Days Days of the week this range applies, or empty for all.
Times Starting and ending times separated by a -, or empty for all.

data.name: import_erow
data.value: Line $1 of the CSV file is invalid : <tt>$2</tt>

data.name: import_esource
data.value: Invalid source address or network on line $1 : <tt>$2</tt>

data.name: import_edest
data.value: Invalid destination address or network on line $1 : <tt>$2</tt>

data.name: import_eservclash
data.value: Service name is already in use on line $1 : <tt>$2</tt>

data.name: import_eproto
data.value: Missing or unknown protocol on line $1 : <tt>$2</tt>

data.name: import_eport
data.value: Missing or invalid port number on line $1 : <tt>$2</tt>

data.name: import_egroupclash
data.value: Group name is already in use on line $1 : <tt>$2</tt>

data.name: import_etimeclash
data.value: Time name is already in use on line $1 : <tt>$2</tt>

data.name: import_etimeday
data.value: Invalid day of the week on line $1 : <tt>$2</tt>

data.name: import_etimenone
data.value: No days or times specified on line $1

data.name: import_done1
data.value: $1 firewall rules have been successfully imported.

data.name: import_done4
data.value: $1 time ranges have been successfully imported.

data.name: report_none
data.value: No matching firewall log entries were found.

data.name: report_none2
data.value: No firewall log entries have been recorded yet.

data.name: report_welfdesc
data.value: Click this button to export all the matching firewall log entries in WELF format, for analysis using programs that support this format.

data.name: report_done
data.value: Successfully exported $1 log entries in WELF format to $2.

data.name: report_savedesc
data.value: Enter a name below and click this button to save this search for later user.

data.name: report_loaddesc
data.value: Select a saved search below and click this button to display matching log entries.

data.name: report_esave
data.value: Missing or invalid name for saved search

data.name: welf_done1
data.value: Firewall logs in WELF format have been successfully saved to $1.

data.name: welf_done2
data.value: Firewall logs in WELF format have been successfully uploaded to the FTP server $1 as $2.

data.name: welf_done3
data.value: Firewall logs in WELF format have been successfully emailed to $1.

data.name: bandwidth_enabled
data.value: Monitor network traffic for bandwidth reporting?
